attributes.action: Save people of Mariupol surrounded and trapped in AzovStal Plant
attributes.additional_details:
There are around 2,500 people hiding in the catacombs of the plant including babies, children, women, and the elderly, some 500 wounded plus very brave soldiers who are ready to fight to the end.  Please don't make them all die and do everything you can to save them. Just save them, please
More information can be obtained from most news channels about the situation in Mariupol 
The initiator of the petition was born in Mariupol and is a British citizen now since mid 90ties
attributes.background: Help people trapped in Mariupol.  This can be done via direct negotiation with Putin. Or by extracting people from the AzovStal plant militarily.  Or maybe some other way.  Please find a way to save them and take them to a safe place.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Urge UN to provide safe evacuation routes from war zone in Ukraine: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/610069

Help Ukrainian refugees and create a safe path for them to get to the UK: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609574

Decisions about how any UK involvement in the evacuation of particular parts of Ukraine would be an operational matter for the armed forces.
